profile:
Green Coast Rubbish is a family owned and operated full service junk removal company based in North Vancouver, BC. Since 2006 we have provided environmentally conscious disposal services by employing sustainable waste diversion and recycling practices at a competitive price throughout the lower mainland of Vancouver. We also do demolition and deconstruction jobs ranging from tree houses to entire home teardowns. 

At Green Coast Rubbish, we pride ourselves on being an active member within the community, offering professional, courteous, and hassle-free service in an industry that is full of rubbish.

In 2016, we managed to reduce our greenhouse gas emissions per 1K revenue by 45%. Additionally, in 2017 we also achieved a 79% diversion rate and recycled over 550 tonnes of material. Feel free to contact us at 604.230.4530.


Accomplishments & Awards:

2017 - BBB's Community Excellence Award Recipient 
2016 - NVCC Business of the Year Finalist 
2016 - BBB's Green Torch Award Recipient
2016 - RCBC Environmental Award
2013 - BBB's Green Torch Award Recipient
2013 - Voted the 'Best Green Business" on the North Shore by the Outlook  
2012 - Winner of the "BC Ideas: Solutions for Strong Communities" competition
2012 - Small Business BC's top 5 'Best Green Businesses' of BC
 
Services:

Professional Junk Removal & Recycling, Mattress Recycling, Furniture Removal & Recycling, Office Furniture Removal, Electronic Waste Recycling, Construction & Renovation Waste Removal & Recycling, Garbage Removal, Waste Hauling, Wood Recycling & Removal, Metal Recycling, Concrete Demolition & Recycling. Demolition Services, including but not limited to: removing old sheds, tree forts, car ports, gutting bathroom, kitchens, apartments & condo's, complete home & warehouse tear downs. You name it, we can deconstruct or demolish it. 

SPECIALTIES:

We go that extra step to ensure that your debris is recycled and or donated. As such, in 2016 we achieved an 82% diversion rate. That's over 540 tonnes of material diverted from our local landfill to alternative recycling and recovery waste stream sources. Furthermore, since 2010 we have diverted an impressive 2546.22 tonnes or 5,613,454.21 pounds of waste material away from our landfills.

To find out more about who we are, what we do, and how we are involved in the community please visit our site: greencoastrubbish.com.

profile:
We pride ourselves on arriving on time for every job we do.

Our movers are trained to stay in touch with you before we arrive and during your move.
Always on time
Our reputation is extremely important to us. 

YOUR LOCAL MOVERS has been operating in Vancouver for over 9 years.

We work with many small to large businesses in Vancouver such as:
HERSCHEL, FORM AND FUNCTION, REEL ONE PRODUCTIONS, FAITH WILSON GROUP, REFRESH HOME STAGING, SPACE LIFT and many other businesses. 

Fast, efficient, careful
All of our movers are professionally trained to operate as efficiently and as careful as possible.
We use GPS in our trucks to eliminate any chance of getting lost while on the job.
All of our movers are trained to protect your house and all your furniture during the move.

Customer service
We are always doing our best to do whatever we can to take the stress off of you. 
Even before the move starts we will make sure to do everything we can to make your move day goes as smooth as possible.

We are experts at figuring out logistics, timing and estimating your job so there are no surprises or hidden costs when we do the billing.

We do not require deposits on any jobs.
 
Why Hire Us?
With an abundance of moving companies to choose from in Vancouver, we do our best to stand out. Here are some of the things you can expect from us when you hire us to do your move:
- ​We are fully insured and covered by WCB.
- We always make sure you have an upfront and very competitive estimate with no hidden costs.
- You are going to feel comfortable when our experienced and friendly movers greet you the day of your move.
- All your most delicate items will be wrapped and padded before leaving your home.
- Our trucks and all of our equipment are clean.
- All your valuable possessions will arrive in the same condition they were picked up in.

SO WHY WAIT? 
CALL TODAY!
604 308 4831

profile:
Doug’s Rubbish Removal is an expert junk elimination and recycling company that supplies clean trucks, fast response times and friendly, uniformed teams to get the job done right! We provide our services to community members of the Lower Mainland and Fraser Valley including Vancouver, West Vancouver, North Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Richmond, New Westminster, Port Moody, Surrey, White Rock, Delta, and surrounding areas.
We have been offering customer-approved, fast, budget-friendly junk removal, residential or commercial clean-ups, and scrap hauling for happy clients for many years. We have all the equipment necessary to tackle your rubbish needs.

With many years on the job, we are able to give quotes that we can stand by. All rates and fees are up front, no surprises. Get Your Free Quote Now!
